snippet: With Coach Tito Vilanova back after a throat operation, host Barcelona routed Espanyol, 4-0, to expand its lead to 11 points in Spain’s top league.
abstract: Barcelona routes Espanyol, 4-0, to expand its lead to 11 points in Spain’s top soccer league.
lead_paragraph: With Coach Tito Vilanova back after a throat operation, host Barcelona routed Espanyol, 4-0, to expand its lead to 11 points in Spain’s top league.
